registers.name: BOOT_CFG
registers.description: Boot Configuration

bitfields.name: DEFAULT_BOOT_SOURCE
bitfields.description: Primary boot source

values.name: SECONDARY_BOOT_LOADE
values.description: SECONDARY_BOOT_LOADER_0b10: Secondary Boot loader in Bank1 IFR0 (32KB)

bitfields.name: ISP_BOOT_INTERFACE
bitfields.description: ISP boot interface

bitfields.name: RECOVERY_BOOT_SOURCE
bitfields.description: Recovery boot source

values.name: SB3_IMAGE
values.description: SB3 image in 1-bit SPI flash connected to FlexComm overlapped with FlexSPI A

bitfields.name: CORE_CLOCK
bitfields.description: Core Clock

bitfields.name: HEADER
bitfields.description: CMPA Header marker should be set to 0x5963

registers.name: FLASH_CFG
registers.description: Flash Configuration

bitfields.name: FLASH_REMAP_SZ
bitfields.description: Flash remap size.This field should be written to remap field in flash.

bitfields.name: OEM_BANK1_IFR0_PROT
bitfields.description: Defines protection for Bank1_IFR0.Set RWXL = 1010 when jumping to Bank1_IFR0 address.

values.name: RWXL_1010
values.description: Set to RWXL = 1010 on user image exit.

values.name: RWXL_1011
values.description: Set to RWXL = 1011 on user image exit.

values.name: RWXL_0011
values.description: Set to RWXL = 0011 on user image exit.

values.name: RWXL_0001
values.description: Set to RWXL = 0001 on user image exit.

bitfields.name: ISP_FT_ENTRY
bitfields.description: Authentication failure

bitfields.name: ISP_PIN_ENTRY
bitfields.description: Disable ISP mode entry  through pin assertion.

bitfields.name: ISP_DM_ENTRY
bitfields.description: Disable ISP mode entry through debug mailbox command.

bitfields.name: ISP_API_ENTRY
bitfields.description: Disable ISP mode entry through ROM API call. ISP mode can be entered through ROM API invocation

registers.name: BOOT_LED_STATUS
registers.description: BOOT_LED_STATUS

bitfields.name: REC_BOOT_LED
bitfields.description: Assert on recovery boot. ROM drives the GPIO pin identified by this field whenever primary boot fails and fall through to recovery boot source.

bitfields.name: ISP_BOOT_LED
bitfields.description: Assert on ISP fall through. ROM drives the GPIO pin identified by this field whenever primary boot fails and execution falls through to ISP mode.

bitfields.name: BOOT_FAIL_LED
bitfields.description: Assert on fatal errors during boot. ROM toggles the GPIO pin identified by this field whenever primary boot fails due to fatal errors before locking-up/reset. Note, use QUICK_SET_/CLR_GPIOx field to set the default level of pin.

registers.name: BOOT_TIMERS
registers.description: BOOT_TIMERS

bitfields.name: POWERDOWN_TIMEOUT_SECS
bitfields.description: Powerdown timeout:Timeout value in seconds. When a non-zero value is programmed in this field ROM uses it as idle timeout value to enter power-down state to conserve power.

bitfields.name: WDOG_TIMEOUT_COUNT
bitfields.description: WDOG timeout:Upper 16 bits of 24-bit count value in WWDT_TC register Timeout value in seconds. When a non-zero value is programmed in this field ROM configures the watch dog timer to reset the device on timeout before passing execution control to user code.

registers.name: FLEXSPI_BOOT_CFG0
registers.description: FLEXSPI_BOOT_CFG0

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_AUTO_PROBE
bitfields.description: Quad/Octal-SPI flash auto probe feature enable

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_PROBE_TYPE
bitfields.description: Quad/Octal-SPI flash probe type.

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_FLASH_TYPE
bitfields.description: Define typical Serial NOR Flash types

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_DUMMY_CYCLES
bitfields.description: Quad/Octal-SPI dummy cycles for read command.

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_FREQUENCY
bitfields.description: Q/O-SPI flash interface frequency.

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_RESET_ENABLE
bitfields.description: Use QSPI_RESET_PIN to reset the flash device.

values.name: NO_RESET
values.description: NO_RESET(O/QSPI device reset pin is not connected or available

values.name: EN_RESET
values.description: EN_RESET(O/QSPI device reset pin is connected to a GPIO (QSPI_RESET_PIN)

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_RESET_GPIO_PORT
bitfields.description: GPIO  port number to use for O/QSPI reset function

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_RESET_GPIO_PIN
bitfields.description: GPIO  pin number to use for O/QSPI reset function

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_HOLD_TIME
bitfields.description: Wait time before access to Serial Flash.

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_PWR_HOLD_TIME
bitfields.description: Delay after POR before accessing Quad/Octal-SPI flash devices in addition to delay defined by FLEXSPI_HOLD TIME field.

bitfields.name: PORT_SEL
bitfields.description: Defined which FlexSPI portA/B is used for boot.

registers.name: FLEXSPI_BOOT_CFG1
registers.description: FLEXSPI_BOOT_CFG1

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_DELAY_CELL_NUM
bitfields.description: Delay cell numbers for Flash read sampling via DQS (either internal loopback or external DQS)

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_IMAGE_OFFSET
bitfields.description: Any offset in memory mapped Q/Octal-SPI Flash area could be remapped to offset zero to support  eXecute In Place (XIP) of image programmed at different offset.

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_REMAP_IMAGE_SIZE
bitfields.description: Any offset in memory mapped QSPI Flash area could be remapped to offset zero to support  eXecute In Place (XIP) of image programmed at different offset. This allows to build all update images with same RO base address, which are programmed at offset 0 or higher offset. QSPI_IMAGE_OFFSET field specifies the offset location of second image. QSPI_IMAGE_SIZE field specifies the size multiple to determine the size of area to be remapped.

values.name: SIZE_1MB
values.description: SIZE_1MB Size of remapped area is 1MByte

values.name: SIZE_2MB
values.description: SIZE_2MB Size of remapped area is 2MByte

values.name: SIZE_3MB
values.description: SIZE_3MB Size of remapped area is 3MByte

values.name: SIZE_4MB
values.description: SIZE_4MB Size of remapped area is 4MByte

values.name: SIZE_5MB
values.description: SIZE_5MB Size of remapped area is 5MByte

values.name: SIZE_6MB
values.description: SIZE_6MB Size of remapped area is 6MByte

values.name: SIZE_7MB
values.description: SIZE_7MB Size of remapped area is 7MByte

values.name: SIZE_8MB
values.description: SIZE_8MB Size of remapped area is 8MByte

values.name: SIZE_9MB
values.description: SIZE_9MB Size of remapped area is 9MByte

values.name: SIZE_10MB
values.description: SIZE_10MB Size of remapped area is 10MByte

values.name: SIZE_11MB
values.description: SIZE_11MB Size of remapped area is 11MByte

values.name: SIZE_12MB
values.description: SIZE_12MB Size of remapped area is 12MByte

values.name: SIZE_256KB
values.description: SIZE_256KB Size of remapped area is 256KByte

values.name: SIZE_512KB
values.description: SIZE_512KB Size of remapped area is 512KByte

values.name: SIZE_768KB
values.description: SIZE_768KB Size of remapped area is 768KByte

registers.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG
registers.description: Secure Boot Configuration

bitfields.name: SEC_BOOT_EN
bitfields.description: Secure boot enforcement. This field defines the minimum image verification procedure (CRC32, CMAC, ECDSA sign).

values.name: CRC32_IMAGES
values.description: Only CRC32 or signed (CMAC or ECDSA) images are allowed.

values.name: SIGNED_IMAGES
values.description: Only Signed (CMAC or ECDSA) images are allowed.

values.name: ECDSA_SIGNED
values.description: Only ECDSA signed images are allowed.

bitfields.name: LP_SEC_BOOT
bitfields.description: Secure boot option for low-power wake from power-down and deep-powerdown.For PFR/ROMP do CRC check always.

values.name: CHECK_CRC32
values.description: CRC check for PFR and CRC32 check of active image

values.name: CHECK_JUMP
values.description: CRC check for PFR and jump to vector address specified in CFPA.

values.name: CMAC_CHECK
values.description: CRC check for PFR and CMAC check of active image

bitfields.name: ENF_CNSA
bitfields.description: Enforce CNSA

values.name: ECC_P384_0
values.description: ECC P-384 keys, SHA384 and AES256

values.name: ECC_P384_1
values.description: ECC P-384 keys, SHA384 and AES256

values.name: ECC_P384_2
values.description: ECC P-384 keys, SHA384 and AES256

bitfields.name: ENF_TZM_PRESET
bitfields.description: Enforce TrustZone-M Preset

values.name: ENFORCE_0b01
values.description: Enforce preset TZM data in image manifest.

values.name: ENFORCE_0b10
values.description: Enforce preset TZM data in image manifest.

values.name: ENFORCE_0b11
values.description: Enforce preset TZM data in image manifest.

bitfields.name: ITRC_ZEROIZE
bitfields.description: RAM zeroize on ITRC event. Zeroize long-term storage RAM (AO_RAM) on subsequent boot when Intrusion and Tamper control signals an intrusion event.

values.name: PKC_RAM_ON_ITRC
values.description: Always Zeroize PKC RAM on ITRC event only.

values.name: PKC_RAMA_ON_ITRC
values.description: Zeroize PKC and AO RAM on ITRC event only.

values.name: PKC_RAMA_ALL_RESET
values.description: Always Zeroize PKC and AO RAM on all reset boot.

bitfields.name: ACTIVE_IMG_PROT
bitfields.description: Protection of active image. This field defines protection of flash area occupied by active image. Only applicable to internal flash.

values.name: NO_PROTECTION
values.description: No protection after from ACL list.

values.name: WITH_STICKY_LOCK
values.description: Write protect active image area with sticky lock.

values.name: NO_STICKY_LOCK
values.description: Write protect active image area without sticky lock.

values.name: XOM_PROTECTION
values.description: XOM protect active image area with sticky lock.

bitfields.name: REG0_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bitfields.description: Region 0 Erase Check Enable

bitfields.name: REG1_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bitfields.description: Region 1 Erase Check Enable

bitfields.name: REG2_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bitfields.description: Region 2 Erase Check Enable

bitfields.name: REG3_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bitfields.description: Region 3 Erase Check Enable

bitfields.name: NPX_LOCK_CTX0
bitfields.description: Lock onchip flash NPX PRINCE context 0 settings.

values.name: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHEC
values.description: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHECK: Region is locked. But no erase check.

values.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN
values.description: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_0: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

values.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1
values.description: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

bitfields.name: NPX_LOCK_CTX1
bitfields.description: Lock onchip flash NPX PRINCE context 1 settings.

values.name: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHEC
values.description: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHECK: Region is locked. But no erase check.

values.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_E
values.description: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_0: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

values.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1
values.description: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

bitfields.name: NPX_LOCK_CTX2
bitfields.description: Lock onchip flash NPX PRINCE context 2 settings.

values.name: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHEC
values.description: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHECK: Region is locked. But no erase check.

values.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_E
values.description: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_0: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

values.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1
values.description: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

bitfields.name: NPX_LOCK_CTX3
bitfields.description: Lock onchip flash NPX PRINCE context 3 settings.

values.name: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHEC
values.description: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHECK: Region is locked. But no erase check.

values.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_E
values.description: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_0: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

values.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1
values.description: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

registers.name: IPED0_START
registers.description: IPED region 0 Start

bitfields.name: GCM_MODE
bitfields.description: GCM mode enable.

values.name: ENABLE_CTR_MODE
values.description: Region is enabled in CTR mode

values.name: ENABLE_GCM_MODE
values.description: Region is enabled in GCM mode.

bitfields.name: AHBERR_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable AHB bus error. If GCM authentication fails generates bus error or not.

bitfields.name: IPED_CTX0_START_ADDR
bitfields.description: IPED_CTX0_START_ADDR

registers.name: IPED0_END
registers.description: IPED region 0 End

bitfields.name: LOCK_EN
bitfields.description: Lock the external PRINCE context settings.

bitfields.name: IPED_CTX0_END_ADDR
bitfields.description: IPED_CTX0_END_ADDR
